name: Spare A Square (Waluigi Fan)
description:
Spare A Square is a story driven, 2d puzzle game where you can die to spikes and then use your dead body to solve puzzles.

Disclaimer - The current demo doesn't have any of the story!

The story of the game is a Portal like, Story about AI which is told through characters watching you and talking in the background while you play the game.

The game takes place in a simulation made to test that the AI technology, Which was made by the company Automated Intelligence Technologies, Can solve problems.

What will be at the end of the test? Squared pancake! (Kinda).

This game was entirely made by Noam Stein, which is me. And all sound effects and music were taken from the ZapSplat website.

Also thanks to: Noryprogg, Or Stein, Liron Stein, TTomms and Original. For playtesting the game!

This game was originally a game jam game made in three days for the third Wowie Game Jam that had the theme of "Failure is progress".

This is the link to the Game Jam Version! (Please don't play this).

The current version of the game is just a small demo that doesn't even have any of the story,

The full game should have 3-4 times the content of the current demo and an interesting story.

The full game should come out in 2022, and will be uploaded to Steam.
